snippet: Sidi Larbi Cherkaoui has been named artistic director of the Royal Flanders Ballet, and Tamas Moricz will be associate artistic director.
abstract: Sidi Larbi Cherkaoui has been named artistic director of the Royal Flanders Ballet, and Tamas Moricz will be associate artistic director.

headline.main: Troubled Royal Ballet of Flanders Names New Artistic Team
headline.print_headline: Troubled Flanders Ballet Gets New Artistic Team
